abstract: Random House will release a Facebook app called BookScout that lets users share favorite books with friends and then receive recommendations based on their own preferences.
snippet: Random House will release a Facebook app called BookScout that lets users share favorite books with friends and then receive recommendations based on their own preferences.
lead_paragraph: How do you find out what books friends and family are reading and loving?

headline.main: An App to Sift Through Books
headline.print_headline: An App to Sift Through Books
